purpose: Facilitate the creation and management of complex workflows using node-based structures and agent integration
principle: Leverages a node-based architecture to enable modular workflow design and execution, integrating various agents and tools for enhanced functionality
reusability: Highly composable through its node-based structure, allowing integration of custom agents and tools, with potential API support for external integrations
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may lack comprehensive documentation and stability, limited to specific use cases defined by available agents
name: PocketManus
description: PocketFlow's node-based workflow structure, with Manus' agents and tools!
highlight: Node-based workflow engine integrating Manus' agents for flexible automation
